title: Ticket #2876: Ensure Arguments is always in job ad, even if old Args is being used
description:
Depending on how a job was submitted, with old or new style arguments, a job ClassAd will have either Args or Arguments, but not both. This complicates things for a user that wants to, say, use -format to see the arguments no matter how the job was submitted. It also means that code handling arguments needs to be smart enough to handle both.

Proposed: ensure that Arguments is always set. It is always possible to transform Args into an Arguments equivalent. Do so in condor_submit. Keep the old Args for backward compatibility with user scripts, but deprecate it and remove internal usage of it.

This is a possible way to also fix #2875: Jobs with new style arguments don't show args in condor_q.
